value: content=This privately owned resort is located to the north of the village and is famously home to the largest pool in the world, with a lenghth of over 1 km and an estimated content of some 250,000,000 litres of Pacific Ocean water. The resort offers all the services you might imagine, from apartments and restaurants to clubs, a sea aquarium, sport schools and cultural exhibitions.
